about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive solution for document management, supporting over 50 file types, including PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and archives. Easily merge, split, reorder, extract, and remove pages to structure your documents as needed.

more_features.title: Document merging tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides advanced document processing capabilities, supporting over 50 widely used file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different document formats
feature_1.content: Merge various file types, including PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and images. Define specific pages to include in the merge process.

feature_2.title: Page management
feature_2.content: Easily reorganize, delete, or swap pages to structure documents efficiently.

feature_3.title: Modify page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and toggle between landscape and portrait modes for compatible file formats.

feature_4.title: Extract pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract specific pages, saving them as a new document.
